name: Be Good
description:
We all know the ET game made for Atari in 1982 was a total bust. My game is a short and sweet , re-imagined version that is definitely more fun. Help Gerty find all 8 household items that  ET needs to Phone Home before time runs out.  Don't eat the magic mushrooms!

Features music composed by John Williams and characters from the E.T film. E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial is a trademark and copyright of Universal Studios. This game is available for free and was created as part of an assignment for a Game Development course.
